title: ‘Mob of over 100 ransacked homes, set ablaze houses to kill families’, says CBI’s Birbhum FIR - ThePrint
content: ‘Mob of over 100 ransacked homes, set ablaze houses to kill families’, says CBI’s Birbhum FIR  ThePrint
description: ThePrint accessed a copy of the FIR filed by the CBI in the Rampurhat violence, based on the local police’s FIR that details the sequence of events that claimed 8 lives last week.
